item.description:
It’s Ti-ki Time! The Science Center’s 21+ gathering goes tropical!

Put on your grass skirts and get ready to warm up at the Science Center’s first beach party!

Be there with 1000+ friends, for liquid delights (featuring the “Geek on the Beach” shot), 150+ exhibits including NEW exhibits Mindbender Mansion, Team Mindball and Hurricane Force, and much more.
...
DJ John Rzasa spinning the cool beach sounds
Join White Eyed Lizard Band and feel the tropical breezes as their calypso band gets your heat rising.
Experience live Jazz with the Curtis Brothers – they are hot!!!

And there’s more…..Hula Dancers shake their stuff, Board Walk Entertainment, lots of Live Science, Stretch out for the Limbo and Hula-hoop contests, and as always a few Surprise Personalities.

Normal parking rates apply. Garage open until midnight.

Discounted tickets available online NOW! Purchase before Feb 8 and get tickets for $10 vs. $15 at the door! Puchase at https://tickets.ctsci...
item.how_to_find_us: Meet us in the lobby / entrance area between 6 and 6:15!
item.name: Liquid Lounge: Luau!
